articles.author: Curtis Ellis, Curtis Ellis
articles.title: Curtis Ellis: The Coronavirus Exposes the True Cost of the China Price
articles.description: The coronavirus has its own logic, and it does not respect the logic of Wall Street bankers, logistics managers, and mass merchandisers.
articles.content:
We are now paying the true cost of the China price.
The China price is the ultimatum Walmart buyers give vendors: this is the price we will pay if your factory in the U.S. cant meet it, we have one in China that will, and well be happy to help you move there… [+4190 chars]

articles.title: 8 More Americans Confirmed with Coronavirus on Cruise Ship
articles.description: Eight more Americans aboard a cruise ship quarantined off the coast of Japan have the deadly Chinese coronavirus, according to NBC News.
articles.content:
Eight more Americans aboard a cruise ship quarantined off the coast of Japan have the deadly Chinese coronavirus, according to NBC News.
This story is developing. Check Breitbart News for updates.
